title: Verse Piece Tier List
description: Discover the ultimate ranking of swords in Verse Piece, categorized from S Tier to C Tier, to optimize your combat strategy.
heading: Verse Piece Tier List
introText: Discover the ultimate ranking of swords in Verse Piece, categorized from S Tier to C Tier, to optimize your combat strategy.

data.itemDescription: It allows the user to launch a forward-moving boomerang that returns, dealing damage both ways; perform a large area-of-effect slam followed by a powerful slash; and execute a slash accompanied by three fire projectiles fired in a cone formation

It applies a bleed effect to enemies, enhancing damage over time, and has the highest M1 DPS of all swords. Its abilities include unleashing a series of rapid slashes in front of the user, summoning shadow soldiers to attack enemies, teleporting behind the target followed by a critical strike, and releasing a massive shadow explosion that deals significant area-of-effect damage

It executes a long-range thrust attack that pierces through multiple enemies, performs a spinning lance maneuver dealing area-of-effect damage around the user, leaps into the air and crashes down with the lance causing a shockwave, and charges forward at high speed, impaling enemies in its path
This weapon is not listed among the available weapons in Verse Piece
Notably, this weapon is not listed among the available weapons in Verse Piece
This weapon is not listed among the available weapons in Verse Piece

Features a passive ability that heals the user upon landing moves. Its attacks include a short-range barrage, a cone of frost that freezes enemies, a huge area-of-effect (AoE) vertical beam, and multiple large full AoE novas that freeze targets

Utilizes multiple short-range beams, a medium-range cone shot, additional medium-range cone shots, and a forward barrage of butterflies. It also has a buff that increases the weapon's damage by 40% for a short duration
Includes a backward evade, multiple small slashes around the user, a small burst of fire followed by a huge full AoE slash, and a significant AoE barrage from the sky
Offers multiple short-range slashes, a slam followed by additional slashes, a whirlwind of attacks in a large area, a huge full AoE sky beam barrage, and a massive full AoE blast

Executes two angled slashes followed by a larger double slash, multiple short-range slashes, a short-range cone pull, a single large slash around the user, and provides a 40% damage buff for a short duration
Features a full AoE tornado around the user, a long-range beam that explodes on hit, and a long dash forward
This weapon is not listed among the available weapons in Verse Piece
Performs a huge AoE forward slash, long forward-traveling sky beams, and multiple forward slashes
Delivers multiple small but full AoE slashes, a slash followed by three celestial shurikens, a double vertical curtain slash in a 60-degree cone, and a whirlwind of slashes
Executes a short forward beam, a barrage of short beams around the user, and a barrage of short beams focused on a point in front
Provides multiple small AoE slashes, a long dash forward ending with a double slash, a forward AoE pull, and full AoE whirlwind slashes around the user
Unleashes multiple huge AoE slashes, a single large vertical slash, and a long-range shadow curtain
Notably, this weapon is not listed among the available weapons in Verse Piece
Performs a full AoE slash around the user and a long forward slash
Delivers a double slash, multiple medium-sized AoE slashes around the user, and a huge AoE dash forward
Executes a medium-sized forward push, a beam strike, and a long-distance forward dash
Features a huge vertical angled slash and a medium AoE dash forward
Performs a double slash that travels forward and multiple medium-sized AoE slashes
Delivers an angled slash that travels forward and a full AoE slash around the user
Executes a short-range push, a huge full AoE whirlwind around the user, and two claw attacks followed by a slash
